2. **Polycrystallline Silicon Solar Panel**: These modules also use silicon wavers but contain multiple crystals instead of one large crystal like monocrystalls. Characteristics include:
+ Lower cost than monocrystals
+ Efficiency rate around 12-16%
+ Temperature coefficient is higher than monosilicon
